aeropress_standard.description: James Hoffmann's ultimate technique. No inversion needed. Simple, forgiving, clean and sweet.

chemex_classic.name: Classic Chemex
chemex_classic.description: Thick filters remove oils and fines, resulting in an incredibly clean, bright, and elegant cup.
